alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 2:11AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bexar and southeastern Comal Counties through 300 AM CST... At 211 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shavano Park, or near San Antonio Int Airport, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, Schertz, San Antonio Int Airport, Canyon Lake, Leon Valley, Helotes, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Timberwood Park, Leon Springs, The Dominion, Castle Hills, Hill Country Village, Grey Forest, Bracken and Sattler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
